=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 7, col = 11)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 7, col = 11)

The avatar is at (7, 11). It is surrounded by dirt and a boulder. There is a lot of dirt, diamond and boulders to collect. The exit is located at (2, 6). There is also a butterfly and a crab that can be chained. The crab is at (6,6) and the butterfly is at (6,2). Need to go up and then left to trigger the butterfly/crab chain.
Action:5
I will move up to explore the area above.
